name: SBHP
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, Italian, German, Spanish.  Only a hero would dare to enter the world of SpongeBob's cotton candy and rainbow filled mind! • Play as fan favorite characters in regular form or as heroes from the movie! You can even play as Plankton! • Weave your way through obstacles and puzzles in popular settings from the movie, including Bikini Bottom! • Play with up to 4 people in multi-player mode on the Xbox 360 gaming system!
